pr_title: Update tool/colors to support generating mapping for CupertinoColor

timeline.bodyText:
This is a lot of code that could potential get out of date wrt CupertinoColors and or will need maintenance.
To speak to your comment in the PR, could we reduce the amount of code here if we generate the properties files from a Flutter app, ala the current icons code?
If I remember correctly, the code to match colors was written before the code to generate icons, so just may not have been aware of the other way to generate these files.
timeline.author: devoncarew

timeline.message: Download and generate colors without needing a hard-coded list
Add a TODO about splitting scripts out
